job_description:
• , 4+ years of relevant biotechnology or pharmaceutical industry experience.
• Experience in a process or product development role, especially technology transfer to manufacturing and/or QC groups.
• Proficient in standard molecular biology techniques such as sample preparation, nucleic acid amplification and purification (RNA/DNA), and DNA/RNA in situ hybridization experience.
• Light and fluorescent microscopy experience.
• Experience with experimental design and statistical data analysis.
• Experience troubleshooting molecular biology-based assays and issues with reagent quality (manufacturing process, QC and stability).
• Experience generating reports/presentations and forecasting reagent usage and costs.
• Strong collaboration and communication skills.

job_title: Software Engineer II - QA Automation, Java, Spring, AWS, Oracle, Postgres
job_description:
• Quant Analytics Manager - Customer Experience Analytics Mumbai, Maharashtra, India Data & AnalyticsQuant Analytics Drive impactful customer experience analytics and insights as a leader in our data-driven Decision Sciences team.
• Applied AIML Data Scientist Lead - Vice President Plano, TX, United States Data & AnalyticsPredictive Science The Applied AI Machine learning Lead who applies quantitative, data science and analytical skills to complex problems.
• Applied AI ML Engineer-Vice President New York, NY, United States Data & AnalyticsPredictive Science The Applied AI Machine learning Scientist who applies quantitative, data science and analytical skills to complex problems 2026 Asset Management Data Scientist - Summer Associate Hong Kong Data & AnalyticsSeasonal Employee Leverage NLP and AI expertise to develop innovative solutions that drive investment insights and process automation.
• Software Engineer III - AI LONDON, LONDON, United Kingdom TechnologySoftware Engineering Tackling complex engineering challenges across AI/ML and driving intelligent decision-making in the firm's data ecosystem Senior Associate Quant Analytics Plano, TX, United States and 2 more Data & AnalyticsQuant Analytics The Senior Quant Analyst supports Mortgage Servicing with analytics, reporting, and dashboards and strong communication skills.
• Associate - Python/BigData Buenos Aires, Argentina TechnologySoftware Engineering Big Data Software Engineer with skills and experience implementing large-scale, cloud platform processing internal and 3rd party data Lead Software Engineer – Applied AI/ML Infrastructure – Cloud/Platform - (Kubernetes / AWS / Terraform) LONDON, LONDON, United Kingdom TechnologySoftware Engineering Promote innovation as a Lead Software Engineer, leading projects with Python, Kubernetes, and AWS expertise.
• Quantitative Research – Associate/Vice President - Mumbai/Bengaluru India RiskRisk Analytics/Modeling We are looking for an experienced quant to join our team in Mumbai/Bengaluru.
• Marketing Delivery Senior Associate Newark, DE, United States Marketing & CommunicationsMarketing Delivery Senior Marketing Delivery Associate: Use data skills to build audiences and drive omni-channel marketing.
• Product Manager - Governance - Protection & Storage LONDON, LONDON, United Kingdom ProductProduct Management CDAO Data Governance Product Manager-Vice President Software Engineer III -ETL Bengaluru, Karnataka, India TechnologySoftware Engineering This AWS ETL Analyst role focuses on building and maintaining ETL jobs for incentive compensation using AWS services, translating requirements into solutions and resolving issues.
